source.name: Dengue Primary Series Doses Administered to Patient

def.name: Date of Latest Dengue Dose

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: Date and time of last Dengue dose

def.name: No dengue primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No dengue primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Dengue vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: CYD-TDV (Dengvaxia), 3-dose schedule with pre-vaccination screening, the recommended strategy where feasible (pre-vaccination screening whereby only those tested seropositive would be vaccinated)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: CYD-TDV (Dengvaxia), 3-dose schedule without pre-vaccination screening [when pre-vaccination screening is not feasible and in areas with recent documentation of seroprevalence rates of at least 80% by age 9 years]

def.name: Client's age is less than 9 years

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 9 years

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" < 9 years

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: CYD-TDV (Dengvaxia), 3-dose schedule with pre-vaccination screening, the recommended strategy where feasible (pre-vaccination screening whereby only those tested seropositive would be vaccinated)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: CYD-TDV (Dengvaxia), 3-dose schedule without pre-vaccination screening [when pre-vaccination screening is not feasible and in areas with recent documentation of seroprevalence rates of at least 80% by age 9 years]

def.name: Dengue serostatus Observation

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: Dengue serostatus Observation

def.name: Client's dengue serostatus is negative

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's dengue serostatus is negative

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Dengue serostatus" = "Negative"

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: CYD-TDV (Dengvaxia), 3-dose schedule with pre-vaccination screening, the recommended strategy where feasible (pre-vaccination screening whereby only those tested seropositive would be vaccinated)

def.name: Client's dengue serostatus is positive

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's dengue serostatus is positive

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Dengue serostatus" = "Positive"

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: CYD-TDV (Dengvaxia), 3-dose schedule with pre-vaccination screening, the recommended strategy where feasible (pre-vaccination screening whereby only those tested seropositive would be vaccinated)

def.name: The latest dengue dose was administered less than 6 months ago

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: The latest dengue dose was administered less than 6 months ago

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Dengue vaccines") < 6 months

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: CYD-TDV (Dengvaxia), 3-dose schedule with pre-vaccination screening, the recommended strategy where feasible (pre-vaccination screening whereby only those tested seropositive would be vaccinated)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: CYD-TDV (Dengvaxia), 3-dose schedule without pre-vaccination screening [when pre-vaccination screening is not feasible and in areas with recent documentation of seroprevalence rates of at least 80% by age 9 years]

def.name: The latest dengue dose was administered more than 6 months ago

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: The latest dengue dose was administered more than 6 months ago

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Dengue vaccines") ≥ 6 months

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: CYD-TDV (Dengvaxia), 3-dose schedule with pre-vaccination screening, the recommended strategy where feasible (pre-vaccination screening whereby only those tested seropositive would be vaccinated)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: CYD-TDV (Dengvaxia), 3-dose schedule without pre-vaccination screening [when pre-vaccination screening is not feasible and in areas with recent documentation of seroprevalence rates of at least 80% by age 9 years]
